articles.description: CHICAGO — The Illinois Department of Public Health on Saturday reported 3,345 new confirmed and probable cases of COVID-19 disease in the state, including 65 additional deaths. Chicago is on track to move to Phase 4 on Sunday. The deaths were reported in the …
